This figure shows how you can't recover raster information after aggregation.


::: {.cell hash='fig3-10-raster-resolution_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_e3f0ac279a89a5acb84ca334950c1c34'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(terra)
library(tmap)
library(dplyr)
```
:::


Get the data—you'll need some of your own data here.


::: {.cell hash='fig3-10-raster-resolution_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_7870669f03a47718cb5055849fefb3be'}

```{.r .cell-code}
z <- rast("raster-data.tif")
```
:::


Aggregate and disaggregate by 10


::: {.cell hash='fig3-10-raster-resolution_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_55b1a9e6611c5459d6b88bacb10b9820'}

```{.r .cell-code}
z10 <- z %>% 
  aggregate(10)

z_dash <- z10 %>%
  resample(z)
```
:::


Dissolve to polygons, so we can make smaller image files and control the colouring. This step is **slow**.


::: {.cell hash='fig3-10-raster-resolution_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_0ef72f993e50bd66831e19ea82f46a27'}

```{.r .cell-code}
z_p <- z %>%
  as.polygons(dissolve = FALSE) %>%
  as("Spatial")

z10_p <- z10 %>%
  as.polygons(dissolve = FALSE) %>%
  as("Spatial")

z_dash_p <- z_dash %>%
  as.polygons(dissolve = FALSE) %>%
  as("Spatial")
```
:::


Make maps


::: {.cell hash='fig3-10-raster-resolution_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_40cb99639878358a8e788a0c11f0dda1'}

```{.r .cell-code}
m1 <- tm_shape(z_p) + 
  tm_fill(col = "Band 1", breaks = seq(180, 280, 10), 
          palette = "BrBG", style = "fixed") + 
  tm_legend(show = FALSE) + 
  tm_layout(inner.margins = 0, frame = FALSE)

m2 <- tm_shape(z10_p) + 
  tm_fill(col = "Band 1", breaks = seq(180, 280, 10), 
          palette = "BrBG", style = "fixed") + 
  tm_legend(show = FALSE) + 
  tm_layout(inner.margins = 0, frame = FALSE)

m3 <- tm_shape(z_dash_p) + 
  tm_fill(col = "Band 1", breaks = seq(180, 280, 10), 
          palette = "BrBG", style = "fixed") + 
  tm_legend(show = FALSE) + 
  tm_layout(inner.margins = 0, frame = FALSE)

tmap_arrange(m1, m2, m3)
```
